body:
Firemind now offers a public json feed ( http://www.firemind.ch/decks/top.json ) which contains the top decks.

Possible ways to integrate with Magarena...
- add an import option.
- add a Firemind Top Decks group to the decks screen.
- - display decks by querying feed on demand.
- - download json file behind the scenes when Magarena is started and use this local version from the decks screen.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Integrate top decks json feed from Firemind.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on August 08, 2014 16:36:56_

Firemind now offers a public json feed ( http://www.firemind.ch/decks/top.json ) which contains the top decks.

Possible ways to integrate with Magarena...
- add an import option.
- add a Firemind Top Decks group to the decks screen.
- - display decks by querying feed on demand.
- - download json file behind the scenes when Magarena is started and use this local version from the decks screen.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=643_
